data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
Select dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Company, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Branch, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.EmployeeID, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.PayTypeID, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.AttrID, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Tran_Date, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Amount, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.PayTypeBalance, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.PayTypeDescription, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Taxable, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.ActiveYN, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.ExactAmount, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.OnPayroll, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Rate, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Units, dbo.YearPayAnalysis.GLAccount, dbo.Employees.EmployeeUserName, dbo.Employees.EmployeeName,dbo.Employees.EmployeeFirstName,dbo.Employees.EmployeeOthername, dbo.Employees.CurrencyID, dbo.Banks.BankID, dbo.Banks.BankName, dbo.Banks.BankAddress1, dbo.Banks.BankAddress2, dbo.Banks.BankCity, dbo.Banks.BankState, dbo.Banks.BankCountry, dbo.Banks.ChequeDate, dbo.Banks.ChequeNo, dbo.Banks.First_Sign, dbo.Banks.Second_Sign, dbo.Banks.First_Design, dbo.Banks.Second_Design, dbo.CostCenter.CostCenterID, dbo.CostCenter.Description, dbo.Groups.GroupID, dbo.Groups.GroupDescription, dbo.Locations.LocationID, dbo.Locations.Description AS LocationDescription, dbo.Department.DepartmentID, dbo.Department.DepartmentDescription, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.AccountNo, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.PFAID, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.PFANo, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.SalaryPaid, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.ActiveYN AS ActiveYND, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.StatePAYE, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.DesignationID, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.ContractTypeID, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.StatusID, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.JobClassID, dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.EmployeeActivityTypeID, dbo.CurrencyTypes.CurrencyType, dbo.CurrencyTypes.CurrencyExchangeRate, CASE WHEN YearPayAnalysis.AttrID='P' THEN YearPayAnalysis.Amount ELSE 0 END AS Payments, CASE WHEN YearPayAnalysis.AttrID='D' THEN YearPayAnalysis.Amount ELSE 0 END AS Deduction ,C.Name, IsNull(C.Address1, '') + ' ' + IsNull(C.Address2, '') + ' ' + IsNull(C.Address3, '') + ' ' + IsNull(C.City, '') + ' ' + IsNull(C.State, '') + ' ' + IsNull(C.Country, '') As CompanyFullAddress, C.LogoURL
FROM dbo.YearPayAnalysis INNER JOIN dbo.Company C ON dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Company = C.Company AND dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Branch = C.Branch
INNER JOIN dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis ON dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Company = dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company AND dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch AND dbo.YearPayAnalysis.EmployeeID = dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.EmployeeID AND dbo.YearPayAnalysis.Tran_Date = dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Tran_Date INNER JOIN dbo.Employees ON dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company = dbo.Employees.Company AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.Employees.Branch AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.EmployeeID = dbo.Employees.EmployeeID
INNER JOIN dbo.Locations ON dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company = dbo.Locations.Company AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.Locations.Branch AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Location = dbo.Locations.LocationID
LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CurrencyTypes ON dbo.Employees.Company = dbo.CurrencyTypes.Company AND dbo.Employees.Branch = dbo.CurrencyTypes.Branch AND dbo.Employees.CurrencyID = dbo.CurrencyTypes.CurrencyID
LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Department ON dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company = dbo.Department.Company AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.Department.Branch AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Department = dbo.Department.DepartmentID
LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Groups ON dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company = dbo.Groups.Company AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.Groups.Branch AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.GroupID = dbo.Groups.GroupID
LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CostCenter ON dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company = dbo.CostCenter.Company AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.CostCenter.Branch AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.CostCenter = dbo.CostCenter.CostCenterID
LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Banks ON dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Company = dbo.Banks.Company AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.Branch = dbo.Banks.Branch AND dbo.YearEmployeePayAnalysis.BankID = dbo.Banks.BankID
WHERE --YearPayAnalysis.Company= @Company --AND YearPayAnalysis.Branch=@Branch --AND (Month(YearPayAnalysis.Tran_Date)=Month(@Period) AND Year(YearPayAnalysis.Tran_Date)=Year(@Period)) and YearPayAnalysis.ActiveYN=1 and YearPayAnalysis.OnPayroll=1 and (YearEmployeePayAnalysis.ActiveYN=1 Or YearEmployeePayAnalysis.ActiveYN=0)
